name: Life of Erlang developer
body:
### Who am I?
An Erlang enthusiast, bleeding-edge technology lover and full-stack developer. My area of expertise is designing and developing scalable backend servers for web pages for COMET, messaging, server-to-browser push, etc.

I do accept consulting and development jobs under an umbrella of SilverSoft Sp. z o.o. company. My team there is willing to build a scalable solution tailored to your needs! Drop me a line!
